sentences.en: Composers write music that is more easily comprehensible without sacrificing originality.
sentences.cn: 作曲家写出既更易为人们理解,又不失其个人独创风格的音乐作品.

sentences.en: Comprehensible experience means a experience thin as a target.
sentences.cn: 知性体验是主体通过知性把握对象时产生的体验.

sentences.en: Her speech was slurred and barely comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 她的发言含混不清，几乎无法听懂。
他的法语很难让人明白.

sentences.en: Our aim is to make the students'speech comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 我们的目的是使学生的讲话被人理解.

sentences.en: Reason, which is a function of memory, organizes perceptions into comprehensible patterns.
sentences.cn: 理性是一种记忆功能, 将感知组织成可理解的模式.

sentences.en: The most incomprehensible thing about the universe is that it is comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 关于宇宙最不可理解的事情是它是可以认识的.

sentences.en: The most incomprehensible thing about the world is that it is comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 最不可理解的事情对世界的是,它是可以理解的.

sentences.en: The puzzling behavior of friends and co - workers finally became comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 朋友和同事的困惑行为最终变得可以理解了.

sentences.en: The technological by - products of science are more readily comprehensible than fundamental science itself.
sentences.cn: 科学的 副产品 一技术,比基础科学本身更容易懂.

sentences.en: User stories are comprehensible by both you and the developers.
sentences.cn: 不管是你还是开发者都能够理解用户故事.

sentences.en: You can use Chinese pinyin to express familiar meanings clearly and comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 您能用拼音清楚地表达熟悉的意思.

sentences.en: Your Chinese is concise, fluent and comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 您的回答简明, 流利,是可理解的.
您的句子简明是可理解的.

sentences.en: Your writing is concise, fluent and comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 您的意思是简明, 流利,是可理解的.

sentences.en: Your writing is concise, fluent and comprehensible. It is amazing!
sentences.cn: 您的文字简明, 流利,是可理解的. 非常感谢这了不起的工作.

words.tran_cn: 综合的；广泛的；有理解力的
综合学校；专业综合测验
